name: Patchwork Kingdom #652 | Roroppa
description: Roroppa is a rare instance of an entire kingdom where none of the 218 schools are connected to the internet (and 22 schools with unavailable data as stars in the sky) | Created for Giga (GigaConnect.org) — connecting every school in the world — in celebration of UNICEF's 75th birthday, by Nadieh Bremer
